trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Apollo
There were no other sightings in Apollo on or around November 13th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsDriving Home from doctor in apollo PA, noticed what at first thought was a cell tower or some sort but the came to realize that there was no bottom to the structure, it was just lights like car lights hovering above gas station. Did not take time to stop. too eerie of a feeling so i kept driving. object was approx 100 ft off ground hovering, no sound, lights were not blinking. didnt see a shape to object just the 3-4 lights. it was almost what a helicopter would look like if it had 4 lights across bottom and was city on top of a building not moving basiccally,.
